name: Understanding Nextjs cache management
description: To better understand caching, I should start by explaining that Next.js uses 4 different caches (Router cache, Full Route cache, Request Memoization cache, and Data cache). These are divided into 1 at the client level and 3 at the server level, as shown in the image.
